title: Interpretation of retaliation in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of retaliation in a dream, interpretation of retaliation in a dream is one of the most important visions that many people fear to challenge, because retaliation involves taking a right, and retaliation can be about bloodshed. Hence the fear that people feel when they see someone taking revenge on them in a dream. God Almighty has prescribed the application of retaliation between men, and God Almighty said in His Glorious Book to preserve human life: “And for you is life, a reward, O men of understanding ...” If no punishment is prescribed; Because people shed each other's blood, God has commanded the healthy to take revenge. Because people have the right to implement it. Interpretation of seeing a man's punishment in a dream If he sees in a dream that one of the people is taking revenge on him; This is evidence that this person is weak in character, he cannot confront anyone with his flaws, and he is not good at dealing with people, and this weak character is what helps people to convey his point of view in addition to suggesting his bad intentions. This person? He does not like good in anyone, but he wants everyone to fail in order to succeed, and he does not treat people honestly. Rather, he shows them the opposite of what he hides, and he sees retaliation in a dream. What proves that this person has suffered from great injustice in his life and that people have violated his rights and he cannot restore his right, but this right dominates his thinking even in his sleep. And if a person sees that someone is taking revenge on him in a dream. This is evidence that he does not apply what God has recommended to his servants and does not abhor what God has forbidden. This is evidence that this man is forced to perform these duties and does not perform them in order to please God. And in this is a warning from God Almighty about the necessity of repentance and returning to Him, and observing what God Almighty has commanded and what God has forbidden. So that we do not face severe torments in this world and the hereafter. Interpretation of a single woman seeing a punishment in a dream: But if an unmarried woman sees that someone is taking revenge on her, he takes revenge on her. This is evidence that this person has hostility and hatred for this woman. This is an indication that this person must be avoided. So that she does not fall into what she does not like in her life, and also if an unmarried woman sees a punishment in a dream. This is evidence that she has committed many sins in her life and she must repent and seek forgiveness from God Almighty and regret what happened in the past. This is evidence that he does not love this person. This is because he caused her many problems in her life, and she wants to stay away from him, but she does not understand that. Interpretation of retribution in a dream for a married woman If a married woman sees that she is taking revenge on someone, this is evidence that this woman hates the one who takes revenge. As for if a married woman sees that someone is taking revenge on her, she is a woman. This is evidence that this person does not love her, but if this woman sees that her husband is the one taking revenge on her, she is the one taking revenge. This is evidence of the instability of the marital life between them, and that this relationship will not last long. We must note at the end of the article that if a woman sees a punishment in a dream. This is also evidence of longevity; Because God Almighty has described retribution in His saying:

title: Interpretation of seeing a library in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a library in a dream: Dreams are many and frequent in people’s dreams. Some of them are good and comfortable, and some are bad omens that do not indicate good. Therefore, search engines abound to discover explanations and interpretations of these visions, and among them is seeing libraries in a dream, where the library is a symbol of culture and knowledge, and many scholars and dream interpreters have found meanings and signs and raised them. This vision, and through this article, we will give you the interpretation of seeing the library in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the library in a dream. It is worth noting that scholars specializing in the science of dream interpretation have come up with a number of interpretations related to seeing the library in a dream, and these interpretations will be explained as follows: This vision indicates what is happening inside the dreamer with deep inner thoughts, feelings, and feelings. In addition, it could be a sign of how knowledgeable and cultured the dreamer is, his good thinking and the soundness of his mind. This vision may also indicate that the dreamer will enter into some projects, deals, and partnerships in the coming days. Coming. It is also a vision that expresses success, excellence, progress and success in all tests and tests if the dreamer is a seeker of knowledge. It can also indicate that the dreamer will have courage, pride, wisdom and strength. Some interpretations confirm that this is a vision that shows that the dreamer has many aspirations and desires that Searching for it. In addition to the dreamer reaching a high position or a distinguished position and power. However, if this place is filled with dirt and dust, this indicates the dreamer’s failure, weakness, and ability to achieve his goals. Seeing a library full of books also symbolizes enormous wealth, abundant livelihood, and good fortune. Which the viewer will enjoy in the coming period. It is also possible that seeing him in a dream is a sign of comfort, security, peace and reassurance that the dreamer feels at that time. As for seeing the wooden library, it manifests the wisdom of the mind, the prosperity of thought and intellect, the breadth of horizons, science and knowledge. As he wanders through it in The dream expresses the dreamer’s continuous search for knowledge and science and presenting it in all ways. Interpretation of seeing a library in a dream. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a notebook in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi in detail. Seeing a library in a dream. An unmarried girl may see many dreams that confuse her, and therefore she has a desire to learn their interpretation. As for her vision of the library, the interpretation was as follows: It is possible that this vision in an unmarried girl’s dream is a sign of the need to discover herself and read her deep thoughts as well. Also, if the girl sees herself going to libraries, this indicates the extent of her mental and intellectual maturity. Seeing a library Full of dirt and dust in a person’s dream indicates an empty mind and lack of ambition. But if a girl in her dream arranges books in a library, this indicates her ability and ability to arrange her thoughts and affairs. Her choice of books also shows that she is thinking about choosing the right book for her from the people who propose to her. Interpretation See the

title: Learn about the interpretation of blood in a dream for a pregnant woman from Ibn Sirin and blood in a dream for a pregnant woman

preview.html: Blood in a pregnant woman’s dreamThe appearance of blood in a pregnant woman’s dream is one of the things that causes her extreme fear, because she immediately believes that there is danger around her child and that the vision may threaten her with miscarriage, but these beliefs are true and valid. It's harmful to her. We explain this during our article and learn about the interpretation of blood in a dream for a pregnant woman.Blood in a dream of a pregnant woman by Ibn Sirindem in a dream for a pregnant woman. The interpretation of a dream about blood for a pregnant woman shows many meanings and it is not necessarily an expression of a problem she faces during her pregnancy. Some experts say that the interpretation of blood is a sign for her. On her pregnancy with a boy, and seeing her in the first days of her pregnancy. And if she finds that she is sitting somewhere, and after she resurrects, she is surprised that this place is full of blood, then the matter expresses the great goodness that will happen to her soon, God willing. As for the bleeding that accompanies severe pain, it is an indication of Her proximity to her birth, especially with her presence last month, expresses the ease of birth, and God knows best. While seeing only blood without feeling pain or pain is an expression of how long her birth will take, and it is expected to be long, but she will come out healthy and safe. Some say Interpreters: The release of blood from the body is a sign of your release from physical pain and the sins you committed, and you are repenting for them at this time.Blood in a dream of a pregnant woman by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that menstrual blood for a pregnant woman is undesirable because it is a sign of the potential loss that she may face. In the near future, she may be connected to her fetus, and therefore she must maintain her health and become closer to God. Pray to protect her from this evil. It seems that the secretion of some blood may be a source of relief for many of her worries and a message to reassure her that the pain and distress that she is suffering from during the period of her vision will go away. While the interpretation differs if this blood is bleeding and the woman finds it in abundance, as it is said that it is an increase in worries and a sign It is clear that the appearance of this blood during the last period of pregnancy is evidence of the few days that separate the woman from giving birth, and it also portends the health and well-being of the child, God willing. To reach the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search from Google on the Egyptian dream interpretation website, which includes thousands Interpretations by the most important interpreters.Blood in a dream for a married woman. A dream of blood for a married woman is interpreted in several different ways, due to the diversity of interpreters’ opinions about it and depending on the amount of blood coming out of the body. Experts say that the heavy bleeding and the woman crying with her in the vision are a result of the severe pain that she feels. It is an expression of the many problems in her reality, the responsibilities imposed on her, and the tension that fills her relationship with it. The husband. While menstrual blood confirms the imminent pregnancy of the woman, God willing, and her great bounty of good offspring adorns her reality with joy and happiness. And if she sees that a doctor is drawing blood from her for donation, she will be a good and generous person, helping the poor and bringing happiness to her family and everyone around her. And when she sees him It leaves her body a lot, so this is not considered good

title: Interpretation of a dream about selling wheat in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about selling wheat in a dream: If you want to know the interpretation of a dream about selling wheat in a dream, it is one of the very disturbing dreams, so they are looking for an interpretation of this dream, but the reader must prohibit it and not believe it at all. Because it is the jurisprudence of some scholars who seek to reach the truth, and he makes mistakes and could be right, and the site and its administrators have nothing to do with interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about selling wheat in a dream Selling wheat in a dream may indicate that he is a very good person at that time, thanks to God. So if If a person sees that he is selling wheat, it may indicate the good and abundant money he earns for us in those days, and God knows best. If he sees wheat selling in a dream, this may indicate that he will be blessed with money or a good job that he will find in those days, thanks to God. Also, seeing Selling wheat in a dream may indicate an inheritance that the dreamer may obtain during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about harvesting wheat in a dream. Harvesting ears in a dream may indicate the goodness that the dreamer may obtain in his life during this period, and God knows best. If he sees If one collects ears of corn in a dream, this may indicate his success in study or work during those days, thanks to God. It is possible that seeing harvesting corn in a dream indicates the ability to achieve the desires and dreams that its owner wanted to achieve during this period. Harvesting ears of corn in a dream may indicate the happiness that may befall the dreamer in his life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about walking in wheat fields in a dream Walking in wheat fields in a dream may indicate a spacious life that the dreamer will have in his life in those days, thanks to... God. It is possible that seeing one walking in wheat fields in a dream indicates good events that may happen to the dreamer in his life during this time, and God knows best. It is possible that seeing one walking in wheat fields in a dream indicates an increase in the knowledge that the dreamer enjoys during this time. period, thanks to God. It is possible that seeing walking on wheat in a dream indicates a profitable trade that the dreamer may acquire during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of receiving wheat from someone in a dream Taking wheat from someone in a dream may indicate good character that he has The dreamer has it at this time, and God knows best. It is possible that the vision of receiving wheat from a man in a dream indicates the abundance of money that the dreamer can obtain and the enormous livelihood thanks to God. If a person sees wheat from another person in a dream, this may indicate Taking care of it and not spending it on things that are not useful in those days, and God knows best. Seeing taking wheat from someone in a dream can indicate that he is a good person and that he is a person of good character, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about receiving wheat from the dead in a dream. Taking wheat from the dead in a dream It may indicate gifts that may come to the dreamer's life during this time, thanks to God. Receiving wheat from the dead in a dream could indicate the happiness that the dreamer enjoys in his life during this time.

title: Interpretation of seeing performing Hajj in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of witnessing the performance of Hajj rituals in a dream or a dream by Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, or Imam Al-Sadiq through the vision website Roy2a.com, performing Hajj in reality is one of the five duties and seeing performing Hajj in a dream may indicate goodness, or it may It is a warning or warning of the appearance of evil, and the interpreters differed in interpreting the vision of performing Hajj rituals, whether she is single or married. A woman, a pregnant woman, or a divorced woman, with its different meanings. Follow us like Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, or Imam Al-Sadiq. What is the interpretation of seeing Ibn Sirin in a dream Hajj rituals? Seeing Hajj rituals and drinking Zamzam water in a person’s dream is good news for her that she will marry a good and rich man. Dreaming of performing Hajj in a dream is a sign of achieving goals and dreams. Seeing performing Hajj rituals in a sick person’s dream is good news that the fortuneteller will be cured of diseases. Dreaming of Hajj in a dream is a sign of paying off debts and abandoning worries. Seeing Hajj and wearing white clothes is a sign of the dreamer’s death. Dreaming of praying in front of the Kaaba is a sign of wealth and the appearance of happy occasions and livelihood. See also: Books of supplication for the steadfastness of the hijab. What is it? Interpretation of a dream when you see a married woman performing Hajj? A dream about Hajj for a married woman is a sign of the arrival of a lot of sustenance for her and her family. Seeing Hajj in a married woman’s dream is evidence that she is a good wife. A dream about performing Hajj incompletely or incorrectly indicates that she is a disabled woman. What is the interpretation of a dream? Preparing for Hajj? Seeing preparing for Hajj in a dream is an indication of the coming of goodness and abundance of food. Dreaming of preparing for Hajj in a married woman’s dream is good news about her imminent pregnancy. Dreaming of a sick person preparing for Hajj in a dream is good news. Preparing for Hajj in a dream is good news for the visionary to achieve his goals and dreams. See also: Interpretation of seeing the veil. In a dream, what is the interpretation of a dream about Hajj for another person? Dreaming about Hajj for another person in one dream is good news for marriage soon. Seeing a single man in his dream that a beautiful girl will perform the Hajj ritual announces to the pioneer a husband for a fair girl. Performing Hajj for another person in a dream is a sign of repentance and apostasy. What is the interpretation of a dream about Hajj? With a dead person? Dreaming of performing Hajj with a dead person in a dream indicates that a righteous dead person resides in gardens of bliss. Seeing Hajj with a dead person heralds the arrival of goodness and livelihood to the dreamer. See also: Interpretation of seeing a man wearing Ihram in a dream. What is the interpretation of a dream about returning from Hajj for another person? If a girl dreams that her father The dead person has returned from Hajj and has already performed the Hajj obligation during his life. This vision heralds the accepted Hajj. It also indicates the righteousness of this man and his life of bliss and comfort. A person sees in his dream someone he knows returning from Hajj, which indicates the acceptance of repentance and the erasure of sins and disobedience. A dream about parents returning from veil is good news for them for Longevity. Seeing deceased parents returning from Hajj is evidence that they are among the people of Paradise. See also: Interpretation of seeing Umrah in a dream. On the site, we are pleased to see the reception of your dreams about “Interpretation of performing Hajj rituals in a dream” through comments, and the dream team will interpret your dream, respond and communicate with you.

On the site, we are pleased to see the reception of your dreams about “Interpretation of performing Hajj rituals in a dream” through comments, and the dream team will interpret your dream, respond and communicate with you.

title: Interpretation of a dream about teeth falling out without blood for a married woman

preview.html: Dreams are among the things that may cause some people to be exposed to them, and some of them have a great desire to know the interpretation in detail, and some want to be discreet and do not want to know the meaning of the dream and its interpretation. Interpretation of seeing teeth falling out without blood in a dream for a single girl. An unmarried woman who sees her teeth falling out without blood announces And the pain of being betrayed by her best friend. The girl must pay attention to all her friends and be prepared to face danger. Seeing the Virgin Mary in this dream indicates the recurring stress and constant tension that the girl is experiencing. Scientists believe that this vision shows the girl’s desire to get married, This dream shows her intense thinking about the matter. Seeing the front teeth falling out of one girl indicates the psychological pressure, nervousness, and psychological state that she is suffering from. A general falling out on an unmarried woman in a dream indicates that this girl is facing many problems and problems with great force. If she sees A married woman loses all her teeth in the lower jaw. It appears that the problems she is suffering from are specific to her family and friends and will disappear soon. Seeing a girl losing her teeth is generally a sign that something bad will happen, and it is an unpleasant vision, so she must be careful. See also: Interpretation of a dream about teeth falling out According to Ibn Sirin, the interpretation of seeing teeth falling out without blood in a dream for a married woman. A married woman who dreams that her teeth are falling out without blood and pain, this indicates a lot of good and abundant livelihood that she will obtain. A married woman sees her teeth falling out in a row, then this dream indicates that all her dreams will come true. One after another. All the goals of a married lady that she wants to achieve will soon be fulfilled and fulfilled. A married woman who sees her teeth falling to the ground indicates that she will obtain a prominent position. A married woman who sees this vision will succeed and will soon reach the highest positions. This lady is striving for the highest position. Positions in her life and soon. In general, a married woman who sees this vision has good and happy news that will bring her goodness in the next life. And a woman who dreams of her teeth falling out in her home, this indicates that God will grant her good offspring. A married woman who sees her teeth falling out but does not feel pain, this means It indicates that her husband has received a large financial allowance. Interpretation of seeing teeth falling out without blood in a dream about a man and its meaning. A man who dreams of his teeth falling out without pain indicates a long life and outliving his company. The falling teeth that a man sees in his dream indicates paying off debts in one go. Teeth that fall out without feeling pain indicate that young people want to achieve many desires and aspire to achieve them in the near future. Teeth falling out in a man’s dream and touching the ground means that the man will forgive himself and marry a pious girl. If it is a year that fell in a man’s dream, this indicates However, he will end all the quarrels that he had. The dreamer who sees a doctor in his dream extracting his teeth, this indicates that many problems that occurred

title: Interpretation of a dream about breastfeeding for a single woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about breastfeeding for a single woman: It is one of the visions that carries different meanings for an unmarried girl. It indicates the arrival of goodness and livelihood for that girl, in addition to the end of the problems that the girl suffered in the period that preceded this dream. Marriage. Interpretation of a dream about breastfeeding for a single woman: A dream about breastfeeding includes some good connotations for a girl, as it appears that this girl will get rid of all the problems she was going through in her life, and if the vision includes breastfeeding a deformed child, this means that. She will solve the problem of a person who was in dire need of her help, and from this vision I inferred the good morals of this girl and her love for helping those in need. Breastfeeding in a dream for an unmarried woman is an indication of the dreamer’s stress, tension, and dissatisfaction with her life. Interpretation of a dream about breastfeeding an unmarried woman by Ibn Sirini, says the great scholar Ibn Cyrine: If an unmarried woman dreams that she is breastfeeding a crying baby, this means that this girl will be exposed to many problems that she will face in her life. The coming period. Breastfeeding in a dream for an unmarried girl carries many meanings and indicators that indicate generosity, joy, kindness, and happiness, but in cases that indicate sadness, anxiety, tension, and despair. Interpretation of a dream about breastfeeding a beautiful child for a single woman. Seeing a girl in a dream breastfeeding a beautiful child, this A sign of the joy that she will enjoy, and that she will have a successful job. Interpretation of dreams about breastfeeding an unmarried child. Breastfeeding a male child in a dream for a single girl has many meanings that indicate the social status of the dreaming girl and this girl’s loss of confidence and her lack of love for anyone and also shows the intensity of the girl’s fear of Feeling loved. . For anyone. A dream about breastfeeding a child indicates love and tenderness, and that this girl is famous for her morals and concern for others in action or speech, and she always takes into consideration the feelings of others, whether in what she says or does. Interpretation of dreams about breastfeeding an unmarried woman with milk. Pouring milk and seeing it in a dream for a girl means Plenty of nutrition and a decent life for that girl, which will lead to her continued happiness and joy in the coming period, but if the milk is little, this indicates her lack of presence. dreamer. Her livelihood and exposes her to constant fear of the future. Seeing milk for a girl indicates that she will soon marry a good man who fears God and loves her deeply, and indicates that she will live with her partner happily and stably in her marriage, in addition to that she will give birth to good offspring from him. If an unmarried girl sees that she is giving milk to a child in a dream, and that this milk is bright white in color, this means that she will be able to achieve all the dreams and desires that she has always been trying to obtain, but if the milk is yellow in color, this dream is an indication that she will not Be able to change her life for the better and realize her dreams. Interpretation of dreams about breastfeeding a child from the left breast for one woman. One girl breastfeeding from the left breast indicates many fears and pressures that she will face in the future.

title: Interpretation of a dream about cutting a snake with a knife in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about cutting a snake with a knife in a dream. Snakes are harmful animals, but what is the meaning of seeing a snake? We then present the interpretation of a dream about cutting a snake with a knife in a dream..Interpretation of a dream about cutting a snake with a knife in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about cutting a snake with a knife in a dream could be a sign of the victory of enemies, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees herself in a dream cutting a snake with a knife, this may indicate victory over the enemy, God willing. If the dreamer sees himself cutting a snake with a knife in a dream, this may be evidence of victory over his enemies, and God knows the unseen. When she sees a snake being cut, it could lead to To solve problems, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about cutting off the head of a snake in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about cutting off the head of a snake in a dream could be a sign of getting rid of enemies and defeating them, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If the dreamer sees the head of a snake being cut off in a dream, this could be a sign of getting rid of problems, by God. I know the unseen. When you see a married woman cutting off the head of a snake in a dream, this may mean that you will get rid of disputes with the woman’s husband, God willing. Interpretation of a dream of cutting off a snake’s tail in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of cutting off a snake’s tail in a dream could be a sign of kindness, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees Cutting the tail of a snake in a dream, this may mean that he will get rid of difficulties, God willing. When a married woman sees cutting the tail of a snake in a dream, this may be evidence that she is getting rid of judgments, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. In the event that an unmarried girl sees the tail of a snake moving after cutting it off It may be a sign of a cheater, and God knows the unseen. A snake attack could be a sign of an evil person who wants to harm you, and God knows best. If a married woman sees a snake attacking in a dream, it may be a sign of harm. From someone, and God knows the unseen. When a single girl sees a snake attacking, it can harm enemies, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. It can also indicate trouble, and God knows the unseen. title: Interpretation of Eid in a dream: Seeing Eid in a dream

preview.html: The dream of Eid for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, whether Eid al-Adha, or the greeting, or Eid al-Fitr, or the Eid clothing of Ibn Sirin and others. Muslims all over the world celebrate two holidays, the shorter of which is Eid al-Fitr, and it was given this name because it comes after the holy month, The holy month of Ramadan, as Muslims fast throughout this holy month. God Almighty ransomed His Prophet, our master Ishmael, peace be upon him, the son of our master Abraham, peace be upon him, with a great ram, so the name Eid al-Adha was given to the great holiday by reference. For sacrifice. Interpretation of Eid in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing Eid day in a dream is evidence of the joy and happiness that comes from God Almighty, because it may indicate ease if a person is suffering from a crisis in his life, whether it is a financial crisis or otherwise. And proof of the acceptance of repentance if that person desires to Asking forgiveness from God Almighty and escaping from worries. If a person is going through a state of anxiety and whoever sees himself as if it is the day of Eid al-Adha and in reality he has lost something, then this is good news that he will get what he wants and also that he will have a good life. Whoever sees himself in a dream as if it is the day of Eid al-Adha and worries about it, God will honor him. He removes his worries and facilitates his affairs. If he is in debt, he pays his debt, and if he is imprisoned, he is released from his prison. A dream about Eid al-Adha indicates that he is trustworthy, accompanies people of goodness and justice, and obtains what a person wants and achieves what he desires to achieve in his religion. Whoever sees Eid in his dream, This Eid did not, in reality, mean a feast other than Eid al-Fitr and Eid al-Adha, as this indicates a pause in the situation and a lack of places. Seeing one of the famous holidays in a dream, as we mentioned, means joy, happiness, repentance, comfort, and the removal of distress. Interpretation of Eid in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Eid indicates joy and happiness. And joy, removing worry and grief, and bringing comfort closer. Whoever sees Eid al-Adha in a dream, this is an indication that he accompanies a person who is aware of the causes of goodness and guides him to do good and increase his religion. Whoever sees in his dream that it is Eid day, and this Eid is not one of the Eid days that the person knows, this warns that person that it will decrease. ​​His status. If this person has status and dignity, but if this person has status, then this indicates the state of life and its distress. Whoever dreams of Eid al-Adha in his sleep and it was on time in reality, this indicates that he will achieve what he wants and achieve what he desires on this holiday. It is He saw in his sleep a holiday known to the people of Dima, this indicates that the enemies of that person fear him. Whoever sees the Ashura festival in his dream, this indicates that he will obtain sustenance, blessings, and prosperity. Interpretation of Eid in a dream according to Nablus. Whoever dreams during his sleep that it is Eid al-Fitr, this is a sign that he will emerge from his distress and go into sadness. And sorrow and a return to joy, comfort, pleasure, contentment and peace. Reason - mind. And if this person wants to repent to God Almighty, then this is evidence that his repentance will be accepted. If this person loses or loses his money, God Almighty will compensate him for that money. And whoever loses something and sees in his dream that on the day of Eid he finds what he lost. Seeing Eid Al-Adha in The dream is a sign of the return of joy and happiness

Whoever sees Eid in his dream, This Eid did not, in reality, mean a feast other than Eid al-Fitr and Eid al-Adha, as this indicates a pause in the situation and a lack of places. Seeing one of the famous holidays in a dream, as we mentioned, means joy, happiness, repentance, comfort, and the removal of distress. Interpretation of Eid in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Eid indicates joy and happiness. And joy, removing worry and grief, and bringing comfort closer. Whoever sees Eid al-Adha in a dream, this is an indication that he accompanies a person who is aware of the causes of goodness and guides him to do good and increase his religion. Whoever sees in his dream that it is Eid day, and this Eid is not one of the Eid days that the person knows, this warns that person that it will decrease. ​​His status. If this person has status and dignity, but if this person has status, then this indicates the state of life and its distress. Whoever dreams of Eid al-Adha in his sleep and it was on time in reality, this indicates that he will achieve what he wants and achieve what he desires on this holiday. It is He saw in his sleep a holiday known to the people of Dima, this indicates that the enemies of that person fear him. Whoever sees the Ashura festival in his dream, this indicates that he will obtain sustenance, blessings, and prosperity. Interpretation of Eid in a dream according to Nablus. Whoever dreams during his sleep that it is Eid al-Fitr, this is a sign that he will emerge from his distress and go into sadness. And sorrow and a return to joy, comfort, pleasure, contentment and peace. Reason - mind. And if this person wants to repent to God Almighty, then this is evidence that his repentance will be accepted. If this person loses or loses his money, God Almighty will compensate him for that money. And whoever loses something and sees in his dream that on the day of Eid he finds what he lost. Seeing Eid Al-Adha in The dream is a sign of the return of joy and happiness
